actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs (Subsequently: Energy and Natural Resources).

official_title: A bill for the relief of Robert E. Saries and Alice J. Saries of Merlin, Oreg.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey a certain parcel of land in Oregon to certain individuals.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Robert E. Saries and Alice J. Saries of Merlin, Oreg.
